content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakes4rvjic.dfs.core.windows.net/files/product_data/products.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0')
    WITH (
        product_id int 1,
        product_name VARCHAR(200) collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8 2,
        category VARCHAR(100) collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8 3,
        list_price DECIMAL(9,2) 4
    ) AS rows
